title: 336,000 servers remain unpatched against critical Fortigate vulnerability
description: 69 percent of devices have yet to receive patch for flaw allowing remote code execution.

title: AMAs are the latest casualty in Reddit’s API war
description: "Will this undermine most of what makes IAmA special? Probably."

title: The link rot spreads: GIF-hosting site Gfycat shutting down Sept. 1
description: Snap-owned service has little to say, other than save or delete your stuff.

title: Pornhub cuts off more US users in ongoing protest over age-verification laws

description: We're failing at preventing foodborne outbreaks—and solving them.

description: Initial hopes of 1 million shipments in 2024 dashed by manufacturing problems.

title: Lonely people see the world differently, according to their brains
description: Brain activity differs among people who feel out of touch with their peers.

title: Apple plans to launch a monitor that stays on when you shut down your Mac

title: Valve says Steam games can’t use AI models trained on copyrighted works
description: "Legal uncertainty" over models means many devs can't establish "appropriate rights."

title: Europe’s venerable Ariane 5 rocket faces a bittersweet ending on Tuesday
description: After nearly three decades, the Ariane 5 rocket reaches the end of the line.
